dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] My Copyright Was Violated By Your Customer]
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, March 15, 2005 7:37 PM
To: Copyright Compliance
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] My Copyright Was Violated By Your Customer]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

For your review.
- --
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] My Copyright Was Violated By Your Customer
Date: Tue, 15 Mar 2005 11:45:42 +0700
From: Smartor XP <smartor_xp@hotmail.com>
To: abuse@theplanet.com
CC: admins@theplanet.com

Hi,

I am Smartor, owner of http://smartor.is-root.com. I have designed an unique
style called "smartUrban" for my site only. And today, i found one of your
site:
http://www.phpbb-olympus.de, http://pspuser.ps.funpic.de, IP: 70.84.243.26
and http://www.movie-quest.de.vu, http://connect.co.funpic.de, IP:
67.18.63.42

They have rip/steal my design. They violated my copyright, reuse it without
my permission :(

You should force them remove that style ASAP.

Thanks,
Smartor

_________________________________________________________________
Don't just search. Find. Check out the new MSN Search!
http://search.msn.com/
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFCN43UvK/XpJs6oyURAonlAJwPxVHcK4oyoS5vwqg17IlP5hkA/QCfezO8
W/pskxtPSZ4fgLMvMPoScG4=
=OtCq
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
